keywordsWithResponses.response: Oh yeah, about that...I thought won a new iPhone! So I sent my details. I mean I already had one but...
All the computers were done for. As were our files. I was fired on the spot.

dialogue.text: I worked in finance for over 20 years and I have earned quite well for myself.
